Title: Long March of the Red Army Poster set
Notes: Over a map looking like a red flag, with a red star in the right-hand corner, the story of the Long March and its suffering is recounted in dramatic and lyrical language. Below, a facsimile of Mao’s poem "Long March" and a sculpture, "The Red Army crosses the Grasslands", a collective work by members of the Sichuan Art Academy.
